WorkflowInfo.Name: Show router interface status
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process checks the status of a specific router interface.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:StartCiscoSession;Assembly=StartCiscoSession, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetInterfacesStatus;Assembly=GetInterfacesStatus, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:TerminateCiscoSession;Assembly=TerminateCiscoSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:StartCiscoSession IsValid="True" x:Name="startCiscoSession1" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="LocalHost" SecureConnection="1" DisplayName="Start Cisco Session" Password="" Description="Starts Cisco Session." HostId="1" TypeName="StartCiscoSession" UserName="" StartSession="{x:Null}" /><ns1:GetInterfacesStatus SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="getInterfacesStatus1" HostName="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:00:20" InterfaceName="e0" DisplayName="Get Interfaces Status" OSType="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Returns a list of cisco interfaces with their status." HostId="0" TypeName="GetInterfacesStatus" /><ns2:TerminateCiscoSession SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="terminateCiscoSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate Cisco Session" Description="Terminate Cisco session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateCiscoSession" /><ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." IsValid="True" Value="%getInterfacesStatus1%" /><ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="e0 status" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="{x:Null}" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="%convertToHTMLTable1%" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
